doc:
Paul Stewart (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Stewart_(actor) 0 Paul Stewart (born Paul Sternberg; March 13, 1908 – February 17, 1986) was an American character actor, director and producer who worked in theatre, radio, films and television. He frequently portrayed cynical and sinister characters throughout his career. A friend and associate of Orson Welles for many years, Stewart helped Welles get his first job in radio and was associate producer of the celebrated radio program "The War of the Worlds", in which he also performed. One of the Mercury Theatre players who made their film debut in Welles's landmark film Citizen Kane, Stewart portrayed Kane's butler and valet, Raymond. He appeared in 50 films, and performed in or directed some 5,000 radio and television shows. Paul_Stewart ( born Paul_Sternberg ; March_13_,_1908 – February_17_,_1986 ) was an_American_character_actor , director and producer who worked in theatre_,_radio_,_films_and_television . He frequently portrayed cynical_and_sinister_characters throughout his_career . One of the_Mercury_Theatre_players who made their_film_debut in Welles 's_landmark_film_Citizen_Kane , Stewart portrayed Kane 's_butler_and_valet , Raymond . He appeared in 50_films , and performed in or directed some_5,000_radio_and_television_shows .
